title: Me Too!
description:
Mercer Mayer's Little Critter is—hesitantly—spending the day with his little sister in this classic, funny, and heartwarming book.Whether he's teaching her how to skateboard, how to fish, or how to make and fly a paper airplane, both parents and children of all ages will relate to this beloved story. A perfect way to celebrate the special bond between brothers and sisters!
Mercer Mayer's
 
Little Critter
 stories, which address all the major issues of growing up, are perennial favorites for generations of readers, both young and old!
author: Mercer Mayer
